brand_info.description: Bangladesh’s first sugar-free electrolyte drink developed in Germany and made for Bangladesh.
taglines: Developed in Germany – Made for Bangladesh
brand_info.brand_message: STRYKER is the alternative to sugary electrolyte drinks. With STRYKER you finally get amazing taste with a good feeling.

addresses.label: Office Address 1
addresses.address: House-28, Road-1, Swapnodhara Housing, Mohammadpur, Dhaka-1207

addresses.label: Office Address 2
addresses.address: Suite-3B, House-40, Road-1, Block-A, Niketon, Gulshan, Dhaka-1212, Bangladesh

products.title: Mixed Flavor
products.description: Bangladesh’s first sugar-free electrolyte drink. Awesome taste, zero sugar, high in electrolytes.

products.title: Blue Raspberry Flavor
products.description: Zero sugar electrolyte drink with clean ingredients and great taste.

products.title: Mango Orange Flavor
products.description: Delicious zero sugar electrolyte drink for recovery and hydration.

products.title: Strawberry Watermelon Flavor
products.description: Refreshing electrolyte drink with zero sugar, perfect for active lifestyle.

products.title: 6 Bottles Stryker (Mixed) + 1 Murgi Squad T-Shirt
products.description: Bundle offer with exclusive Stryker T-shirt.

testimonials.title: Snigdho – Marathon Runner
testimonials.content: Stryker keeps me focused and energized throughout my long-distance runs. With no sugar and clean electrolytes, it gives my body exactly what it needs.

testimonials.title: Dr. Neon – Bodybuilder
testimonials.content: In the gym, every set and rep matters. Stryker gives me a clean boost with zero sugar and essential electrolytes.

testimonials.title: Steve Long – Founder
testimonials.content: Healthy hydration options were hard to find in Bangladesh, so I created Stryker. Developed in Germany, it’s packed with clean electrolytes and zero sugar.

intro.headline: Join the Movement. Fuel the Nation.
intro.description: We’re here to shake up the drink industry — with bold ideas, zero sugar, and full-on hydration. Stryker is for the new Bangladesh.

why_work_with_us.title: Startup Vibes with Real Impact
why_work_with_us.description: We move fast, think big, and take action. Every team member plays a vital role in shaping the brand.

why_work_with_us.title: Collaborative & Open Culture
why_work_with_us.description: We believe in transparency, teamwork, and mutual respect. Great ideas can come from anywhere.

why_work_with_us.title: Continuous Learning
why_work_with_us.description: At Stryker, you’ll never stop learning. Exposed to product development, brand storytelling, and fitness culture.

why_work_with_us.title: Passion Meets Purpose
why_work_with_us.description: We’re passionate about a better lifestyle for our generation. You’ll fit right in if you love health, branding, and community.

why_work_with_us.title: People Come First
why_work_with_us.description: Flexible work policies and fun team hangouts. Team works hard, laughs harder, supports each other.

open_positions.title: Graphic Designer
open_positions.notes: If you’re passionate about what we do and think you’d be a great fit, send us your CV anyway.

perks_and_benefits.title: Competitive Salary
perks_and_benefits.description: Performance reviews after 6 months, with salary increase based on results.

perks_and_benefits.title: Wellness Support
perks_and_benefits.description: Access to our running club, yoga sessions, and more.

perks_and_benefits.title: Snacks on Snacks
perks_and_benefits.description: Because hydration is a lifestyle, not just a drink.

perks_and_benefits.title: Free “Murgi Squad” T-Shirts
perks_and_benefits.description: Courses, mentorship, and a front-row seat to a growing brand.

perks_and_benefits.title: Unlimited Stryker
perks_and_benefits.description: Take home as much Stryker as you can carry.

perks_and_benefits.title: Team Photoshoots
perks_and_benefits.description: Yes, we make you pose like a startup influencer. Sorry, not sorry.

perks_and_benefits.title: Movie Nights & Meme Wars
perks_and_benefits.description: All part of team bonding (and slightly too competitive).

perks_and_benefits.title: Culture
perks_and_benefits.description: We work hard, hydrate harder, and know when to laugh at ourselves.

promotions.title: Come join the squad
promotions.description: Get your exclusive STRYKER deal on WhatsApp.
promotions.privacy_notice: With the confirmation you accept our privacy policy and stay up to date via e-mail.

community.title: Stryker Running Club
community.description: Weekly and bi-weekly running events open to all fitness levels focused on movement, community, and hydration.

call_to_actions.description: Got questions or want to order? Just ask Bristy on WhatsApp.
